channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0196; 04:35AM; 2135 W Slauson Av; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/3XntfRU" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/3XntfRU</a>; #ChesterfieldSquare; Firefighters arrived at the site of a previous burn (from just over 24 hours prior) to find a one-story commercial with heavy fire showing. As crews deployed hose lines and placed ladders, the flames grew rapidly in the already-ventilated building. Firefighters pulled back into defensive mode early in the incident, setting up ladder pipes, portable monitors, and other large hose lines (master streams). The fire consumed two adjacent occupancies, that share a center wall: a one-story commercial and a one-story church. Thankfully, there were no reported injuries. It took 83 firefighters 77 minutes to extinguish the blaze. Per protocol for fires involving a House of Worship, Arson Investigators are responding to conduct an investigation. There will be smoke in the area and crews working on scene for an extended period of time, as the hot spots under the debris continue to smolder. LAFD Heavy Equipment will aid in removing debris and allowing firefighters to continue applying water to deeper hot layers beneath the surface.; FS 66; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC11 BC13 BC18 BC4 CM20 CM22 E205 E226 E233 E266 E294 E33 E34 E46 E5 E57 E66 E94 EA1 EM11 HE1 HR3 PI2 RA266 RA5 RA66 RA866 SO1 SQ21 T26 T33 T5 T66 T94 UR5 UR88; CH7; 12 13; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1431; 06:25PM; 7244 S Brynhurst Av; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/4cdQ3Y8" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/4cdQ3Y8</a>; #HydePark; The first 20 firefighters to arrive performed a fast and aggressive fire attack on the one-story single-family home with smoke showing, taking just 15 minutes to respond, make access, and extinguish the flames. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 66; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 BC4 E233 E266 E294 E33 E66 E94 RA266 RA57 RA66 SO1 SQ21 T33 T66 T94; CH7; 12; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0145; 03:17AM; 2067 N Mt Olympus Dr; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/3VBHDEH" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/3VBHDEH</a>; #HollywoodHillsWest; Firefighters gathered furniture and belongings in the living space below the attic fire to cover with plastic and minimize water damage. Crews cut holes in the roof and breached the ceiling to gain attic access with hose lines from above and below. It took 32 firefighters 44 minutes to extinguish the stubborn flames throughout the attic. No reported injury. Cause under investigation. ; FS 41; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; BC18 BC5 E227 E261 E27 E41 E97 RA41 RA97 T27 T61; CH8; 14; Nicholas Prange

Offensive mode.; FS 41; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; BC18 BC5 E227 E261 E27 E41 E97 RA41 RA97 T27 T61; CH9; 14; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1635; 11:05PM; 2158 W Slauson Av; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/4b2gi2V" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/4b2gi2V</a>; #ChesterfieldSquare; *Corrected Address* LAFD firefighters responded rapidly to the structure fire inside of a one-story commercial building, which shared a wall with a one-story church. Crews forced entry into both occupancies, and extended hose lines inside. Intense flames inside the commercial threatened to spread to the church, but were swiftly stopped by fire attack teams. The church did not sustain any fire damage inside. Ultimately it took 50 firefighters 32 minutes to access, confine, and extinguish the flames. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 66; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; AR1 BC11 BC13 BC18 BC4 CM20 CM22 E15 E205 E21 E221 E226 E233 E266 E295 E34 E46 E5 E57 E66 EA2 EM11 EM13 HR3 RA5 RA66 RA834 RA866 SO1 SQ21 T21 T26 T33 T5 T66 T95 UR5 UR88; CH7; 13 14; Nicholas Prange

Offensive mode.; FS 66; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC11 BC13 BC18 CM20 CM22 E226 E233 E266 E34 E46 E57 E66 EM11 RA66 RA834 RA866 SO1 SQ21 T26 T33 T66; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1563; 10:03PM; 12985 N Herrick Av; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/3xgykk5" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/3xgykk5</a>; #Sylmar; Firefighters found a collapsed detached garage with heavy fire showing. Crews deployed handlines to the rear of the two-story home in the front and contained the fire to just the heavily damaged garage. It took 30 firefighters 22 minutes to extinguish the flames. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 91; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC10 BC12 BC15 CM40 CM42 E275 E287 E298 E7 E75 E91 E98 EM15 RA7 RA75 RA898 RA98 SO1 T75 T87 T98; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange
